headline: Glaad Media Awards Announces 2 Honorees
abstract: The transgender storyteller and the Grammy Award-winning singer will be honored for promoting acceptance and equality in their work.
lead_paragraph: The “Pose” writer, director and producer Janet Mock and the Grammy Award-winning artist Taylor Swift will be honored for promoting the acceptance of L.G.B.T.Q. people at this year’s Glaad Media Awards.
keywords: Gay and Lesbian Alliance Against Defamation
